p: Another promising class of chloroquine complexes for the development of therapeutic agents are gold complexes (Navarro 2009; Navarro et al. 2010). These compounds exhibit antiparasitic potential for the treatment of leishmaniasis, trypanosomiasis, schistosomiasis, and malaria (Fricker et al. 2008; Navarro 2009; Vieites et al. 2009; Navarro et al. 2010; Biot et al. 2012).
